title: NOAH ERP Reverse Engineering
description: Enterprise Resource Planning system reverse-engineered and modernized
shortDescription: Analyzed legacy ERP system and built modern replacement
details: Led the reverse engineering of a legacy ERP system. Designed and implemented a modern microservices-based replacement using ASP.NET Core APIs and React frontend. Improved system performance by 40% and reduced deployment time from 2 hours to 15 minutes.

title: AI-Powered FAQ System
description: Real-time FAQ system with SignalR and microservices architecture
shortDescription: Real-time FAQ platform with AI integration
details: Developed a real-time FAQ system leveraging SignalR for instant updates and Azure AI for intelligent response generation. Implemented comprehensive microservices architecture for scalability and maintainability. Handled 10,000+ concurrent users with zero downtime.

title: Inventory & HRIS System
description: Integrated inventory management with human resources information system
details: Designed and developed an integrated inventory management and HRIS platform serving 500+ employees. Implemented containerized deployment using Docker and Kubernetes for automatic scaling. Reduced operational overhead by 30%.

title: React + ASP.NET Core Real-Time Dashboard
description: Live analytics dashboard with real-time data synchronization
details: Built a real-time analytics dashboard featuring live data synchronization via SignalR. Implemented complex state management with Redux for efficient data flow. Dashboard processes 1000+ data points per second with sub-100ms latency.

title: Cloud DevOps Pipeline
description: CI/CD pipeline for automated deployment and infrastructure management
details: Architected and implemented a comprehensive DevOps pipeline using Azure, Docker, and Kubernetes. Automated infrastructure provisioning with Terraform, reducing deployment time by 80% and improving reliability to 99.9% uptime.

title: Microservices Architecture Migration
description: Migrated monolithic application to scalable microservices
details: Led migration of legacy monolithic application to microservices architecture. Implemented message-driven communication using RabbitMQ. Improved system scalability, enabling 5x increase in concurrent users without performance degradation.
